column1: Podcasting is a way to share information as digital audio files. People often subscribe
column3: and share podcasts using a computer and listen to them on an MP3 player.Many podcasts are similar to broadcast radio news or discussion programs. Some use other formats such as a continuing story
column6: or audiobook.Podcasts can be found for almost anything. Radio shows
column12: and just about anything else can be found. Once a podcast is found
column13: it can be subscribed to like a magazine or newspaper and then downloaded. Once it is downloaded
column14: it can be stored on an MP3 player to be listened to.Podcasting has become so popular that many people who write for magazines or report news on television have also been putting out their own podcasts.
